mapper.select: SELECT tour_no,user_id,text_no,tour_theme,tour_detail,num FROM (SELECT tour_no,user_id,text_no,tour_theme,tour_detail,rownum as num FROM (SELECT tour_no,user_id,text_no,tour_theme,tour_detail FROM tour ORDER BY tour_no DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: insert into text values((select NVL(max(text_no)+1,1) from text),#{text_loc},#{text_cost},#{text_total_person},sysdate, #{text_time1},#{text_time2},#{text_move},0,'n',#{text_tour_date})
